title: Properties and Failure of Materials
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MECH 221 or MIAE 221.

title: Theory of Machines

title: Capstone Mechanical Engineering Design Project
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 301; MECH 344, MECH 390; MIAE 312. Students must complete 75 credits in the program prior to enrolling.

title: Topics in Mechanical Engineering
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the Department Chair is required.
